clinical_history: Limb swelling, rule out deep venous thrombosis.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Uterus appears normal; endometrial thickness measures 39.68 mm.
Right kidney demonstrates coarse, no hydronephrosis.
Common bile duct measures 36.44 mm, within normal limits.
Testes are isoechoic with normal vascularity.
Breast tissue shows ill-defined lesion measuring 20.22 mm.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
